minLength: {0} must be at less {1} characters long
containsAlphaNum: Must contains alphabetic or numeric character.
createdBeforeViaIdentity: A record has already been created using this ID number
withoutSpacialAlternate: Only the alphabet, numbers and ( ) . - / must consist of characters.
noLastWhitespace: No White Space characters at last
noFirstWhitespace: No White Space characters at first
isLeastAlphaNum: Must contain at least one alphanumeric character
gt: {0} value must be greater than {1} value
lt: {0} value must be less than {1} value
